channel.title: December2025 on LRG
channel.description: Recent content in December2025 on LRG

item.title: Songs for Christmas
item.description:
Without a shadow of a doubt, this is the Christmas music you and your hipster mates would play, if it wasn’t too much of a drag.

I am not allowed to play this album in the family areas during the festive run-up, but funnily enough, by the time the big day arrives, we’re all ready for a bit of a palette cleanser…

There’s such a great energy in this album. Trad songs and Steven’s own alike are performed with a fresh-sounding verve. The standout track for me is “Get behind me, Santa!” which just oozes good humour.

item.title: December 11th, 2025 11:54
item.description: Moment of work-based clarity today. I’m fruitlessly chasing people to try and get them to engage, but they’ve already checked out for Xmas (or have filled up what capability they have). This realisation allows me to breathe and think. Plan for the new year, rather than react to what’s left of this one.

item.title: December 10th, 2025 12:06
item.description: Knackered today, because I stayed up watching the final of Physical:Asia last night. It’s a totally idiotic self-indulgence, but I really enjoy the combination of the physical challenges with the (mostly) gentle competition of the teams. Except Australia, who were chirpy, but so full of themselves!

item.title: December 9th, 2025 08:55
item.description:
Woke up at 6am with the joy that comes with knowing it’s Saturday, and you can go back to sleep for a couple of hours.

Was re-awoken at 6:15 by my alarm. It’s Tuesday.
